About Me

A

I am a Doctoral Researcher from Bennett University in the field of Management focused towards Sustainable Development, Green Economics and Green Development. My aim in life is to expand the horizon of my knowledge by contributing to the society while working in a collaborative and corporative environment, and by giving my best in every field and every situation I am put into. My interests are towards research in the field of Economics relating it to different aspects of daily life like the Industry 4.0, healthcare and environment to name a few.

Educational Background

Doctor Of Philosophy

Bennett University
Doctoral Researcher
School Of Management, Jan 2025

The period of research at Bennett is focused on the intersection and exploration of Green Fiancne especially in the banking sector. The focus of the journey is to delve into the various nuances of research with a focus on contributing to the field in a comprehensive manner.

Reserach focus include - Green Economics, Sustainability, Green Development, Carbon Footprinting and many more.

Post Graduation

Shubharti University
Master of Business Administration - Finance and IT
(Distance Learning)

The various intricacies of the world of management with respect to fiannce was the main focus of this degree. It helped me to understand how finance works with respect to the growing influence of technology. The period also helped to hone my research skills by providing a deeper understanding of the monetary systems.

Post Graduation

FS University
Master of Arts - Economics
Sept 2022 - Jul 2024

During my period at FS University I learnt more about the depths of Economics. I also focused on the amalgamation of technical aspects with economics, while contributing to their understanding as well. Thesis - "Carbon Footprinting and household income: A empirical analysis of India", which focuses on bridgining the gap in presence of sustianbility and economic growth.

Graduation

Galgotias University
Bachelor of Arts - Economics
Aug 2019 - Jun 2022

During my time in the university, I learnt to carve my niche in different fields of research. As a part of the academic activities, I wrote a thesis titled, "Caste v/s Class: An analytical study of the society" which focused on relating the economic factor to the prevailing issue of caste segregation in India.


Schooling

Green Field Academy,
Lakhimpur Kheri
Apr 2014 - Mar 2018

My time at Green Field Academy was a very productive and formative period, it helped me in developing my interpersonal skills as well as taught me the importance of making connections. My school also provided me with the platform to develop my oratory skills by participating in many debates and elocutions.
